db:abstract.db:para: Showing spectrogram graph in a QML application.

db:article.db:programlisting:
!include( ../examples.pri ) { error( "Couldn't find the examples.pri file!" ) }
# The .cpp file which was generated for your project. Feel free to hack it. SOURCES += main.cpp
RESOURCES += qmlspectrogram.qrc
OTHER_FILES += doc/src/* \ doc/images/* \ qml/qmlspectrogram/*
